thread.title: Overtime with Matt Jones| Fans should be excited about UK basketball team
thread.title_full: Overtime with Matt Jones| Fans should be excited about UK basketball team

title: Overtime with Matt Jones| Fans should be excited about UK basketball team
text:
Overtime with Matt Jones| Fans should be excited about UK basketball team Posted: Fri 12:33 AM, Oct 16, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) - Kentucky Sports Radio's Matt Jones shares his thoughts on the UK basketball team's upcoming season. 
Big Blue Madness is Friday night, and because of the UK Auburn game Thursday, and other factors, it just doesn't seem to be as big a deal as it is in most years. 
Throughout Lexington, I've noticed fans are just not talking about Big Blue Madness like they used to. 
Now part of that of course, is as Ryan Lemond told you last week, part of it is because of football. 
Kentucky's been playing so well, that's been on people's minds. But I do think part of it is the holdover from the game against Wisconsin last year. 
The Cats fans are excited about any season, but we still remember how painful that loss was. But I'm here to tell fans, get over it. It's now time to move on to the new year. 
This is going to be a heck of a team. Jamal Murray, Skal Labissiere, Charles Matthews and Isaiah Briscoe, are great newcomers, and Tyler Ulis and Alex Poythress return as being two of the best returning players in the country. I know it's tough. 
Last year, the Wisconsin loss gutted us all. But now it's time to focus on the new team. This is going to be a fun team. They're gonna play fast, they're gonna get up and down the court, and they're gonna win a big share of games. 
So get behind them, it starts tomorrow with Big Blue Madness.
